description: HooToo HT-UH003 mounts as many as 6 devices to your computer, while charging another. A 2 USB 3.0 and 4 USB 2.0 combo meets your various needs. A charging port charges your smartphones/tablets by way of a super-fast 5V 2A port. The heavy-duty 5V/4A adapter included is providing more stable current for data transferring and charging.Specifications:- USB Type: 4 USB 2.0 ports, 2 USB 3.0 ports and 1 5V/2A charging port- Transfer Rate: about 10 times faster than USB 2.0- Power: 5V/4A Power Adapter- Dimension:L*W*H:3.91"*2.36"*0.79"Compatible Devices for ChargingApple devices: iPhone 5/4/4S, iPad mini, iPad 4/3/2Android devices: Samsung Galaxy S4, S3, HTC Sensation, EVO, One X; Samsung Galaxy NoteTablets: Samsung Galaxy TabletsOperation Environment:Windows 7, 8, XP, Vista; Mac OS X or above* Mac OS X Lion 10.7.4 users need to upgrade to Mountain Lion 10.8.2 or later for stable performancePackage Includes:1 x USB 3.0/2.0 7 Port Hub; 1 x 3ft USB 3.0 Cable; 1 x 5V/4A Power Adapter; 1 x User Manual.Note:-The charging port (5V/2A) is designed for charging your mobile devices only and will not support data transfers.-Some devices require direct connections to host USB 3.0 ports on computer, such as some hard drives, 2.4 GHz wireless keyboard or mouse adapters.-Apple users need to apply the latest Apple updates so the hub could perform normally. You can contact our support for detail Mac models and specific driver updates.
title: HooToo® HT-UH003 USB 3.0/2.0 7-Port Hub including One 5V/2A Fast-Charging Port for iPad iPhone & Smart Phones. (2 SuperSpeed USB 3.0 Ports, 4 USB 2.0 Ports, Latest VIA VL812 Chipset, 5V/4A Power Adapter, 3 feet USB 3.0 Cable
